summary: Create a blog for the user's village internet cafe center.
imageRequirements:

existing_features.title: Create a public-facing blog site for the user's village internet cafe center with the following pages: Home (intro + highlights), Blog (post list), Blog Post Detail (full post), and Contact/Location (basic contact info and address text).

Add an admin workflow that allows the cafe owner to manage blog posts from the frontend using Internet Identity authentication: sign in/out, view post list (including drafts), create/edit posts, and toggle publish status.
Apply a coherent, creative visual theme for the entire site (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) suitable for a friendly local village internet cafe; avoid blue/purple as dominant colors.
Add and render generated static image assets for the site (logo and hero/banner) from frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them on Home and in the site header/footer.
Replace the current site logo with a new logo image and ensure the header and footer display the updated logo correctly.
Update all frontend references that currently point to "/assets/generated/cafe-logo.dim_512x512.png" to use the new logo asset filename (while keeping existing alt text unless explicitly changed).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a blog for the user's internet cafe center in a village

Implement backend data storage for blog posts in the single Motoko actor, including: post id, title, slug, content (markdown or plain text), coverImageUrl (optional), createdAt, updatedAt, and isPublished flag.

Seed the app with at least 3 initial published blog posts relevant to a village internet cafe center (e.g., services, printing/scanning, online form help, exam/application support) so the blog is not empty on first load.
Update/replace the site's logo with a new design (regenerate and swap the logo asset used in header/footer and home).
